job.title: (USA) Principal Software Engineer - Capacity and Cost Modeling
job.description: Position Summary... What you'll do...  As a part of Global Platforms Infrastructure Services, you’ll help to build an industry-defining approach to managing multi-cloud and enterprise capacity across all of Walmart’s markets. The team is responsible for helping our internal customers plan and scale for holiday events and other activities through a combination of tactical and strategic approaches to capacity planning. You’ll be responsible for combining data science and machine-learning approaches to predict demand with an outreach model that helps us guide users toward more efficiency decisions related to both cloud and non-cloud computing infrastructure across several private data centers and multiple public cloud providers.  You will be in a position to ensure that critical parts of Walmart’s business are prepared for known events while having ample capacity available to address any contingency. You will be driving data analysis to connect software engineers and the infrastructure teams with the data that enables them to scale. You will be acting as a team lead for data analysts focused on workload classification, cloud computing, predictive modeling, and customer outreach.  The ideal candidate will be an individual who has had experience developing and supporting complex data models at scale, and who can communicate nuance assumptions and data models to several levels of executive management.  You’ll sweep us off our feet if… Beyond competitive pay, you can receive incentive awards for your performance. Other great perks include 401(k) match, stock purchase plan, paid maternity and parental leave, PTO, multiple health plans, and much more.
